essay.question-text: The students discuss the announcement from the university president. State their opinions of the announcement and the effect the decision in the announcement will have on each of them.
essay.sample-answer-text:
SAMPLE ANSWER
In this set of materials, the reading passage is a message from the university president, and the listening passage is a discussion by two students on the announcement.
The reading passage contains a message from the president announcing that the university administrative board has decided to add a week (five class days) to the spring semester because eight class days had to be cancelled due to snow. Because of this decision, the spring semester will end on June 5 instead of May 29.
In the listening passage, the students discuss this announcement, and they seem to think that something like this had to be done because so many days of class were cancelled. However, this decision does have some impact on each of them. The woman will miss the start of her summer job as a camp counselor, and she is afraid that might mean she'll lose the job for the entire summer. The man is scheduled to start summer school on June 8, so this decision means that he'll lose a week of vacation between the end of the spring semester and the beginning of summer school.
